website_summaries.verdict: Show-stopping sunglasses that are rather light in weight for the statement they make.
pros: These sunglasses are a favorite of those who are fashion-forward and appreciate a side glance or two
Masculine in terms their strong, geometric design
Surprisingly lightweight for their overall look and feel
cons: These sunglasses may run too large for those with smaller noses or bridges

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed  made in china cheap material !!!
customer_reviews.text: It is made in china Not as mention on Amazon that it is USA made !!! And it look fake and not original ...very dissatisfied ...And no value for money i will never buy sunglass on amazon again .
customer_reviews.author: Moustafa Sharaf

customer_reviews.title: 100% Real Review
customer_reviews.text: If you see a review from me it’s 100% my experience and I’m only writing this because I read lots of reviews before buying something. These glasses I really liked the design and quality of them. I would had loved to keep them but I had to return them because they gave my big head a headache because they didn’t have much give and pushed into the side of my head. If you have a smaller size head they are great glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Carrera sunglasses. I saw these glasses at the mall retailing for about $160 and found them here for almost half price. I can see very well and clear when the sun is bright, they have a nice shade (tone) if you know what I mean. I would recomend these sunglasses to my friends. They are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Mc Cerpa

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of shades
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are very lightweight yet made from quality components. Really like the gradient grey/black lens and slight oversize style, these may be too large for smaller faces. The only foreseeable issue I can imagine would be the leather piece between lenses. If you can find these for under fifty bucks they would be a good deal. Let's see how well they hold up...
customer_reviews.author: Paladin

customer_reviews.title: Loving these badboys
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these glasses already. Just got em today and they look good and everyone looks good in them! I had the whole house (4 people) try them on and everyone looked good in em and they all liked it. I’m happy. I also have Versace shades that i have worn almost exclusively for 7 years but, these are my favorite now.. we will see how they hold up, if they mess up in the future i will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, one small downside.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected, great sunglasses The only down side is the legs of the glasses are too wide and they fall off my face everytime I look down or off my head. They're the only Carreras I own that do this so I'm not sure if it's every pair with this specific model or just mine.. Other than that though, great!
customer_reviews.author: RAELYN PRINCE

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, warped frame.
customer_reviews.text: Just received these. Delivery was right on time. The quality of the glasses is great along with the case being of equal quality itself. The gradual shade of the lenses is just right. Until I put them on. Frame came warped one side being higher than the other. Put them on a flat surface and one side doesn't even touch the surface. It isn't damaged, it has to be a manufacturing defect. Possibly a one-off occurence so I am reordering hoping Carrera isn't a two-time dissapointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: They are FAKE. The glasses didn’t fit the case. The don’t come in the original case
customer_reviews.text: I received the glasses in a car board box. The case for the glasses was to small. THE GLASSES DIDNT FIT IN THE CASE, THE CASE DIDNT CLOSE!! If they don’t come in the original case I’m assuming they are FAKE!! And besides the original ones, these are made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Hector reyes

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: They looked great but were too tight for my head and slid down my face. I returned them. But if you have a head that fits them I would recommend them. They looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging. The sunglass case is cheaply made and ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible packaging. The sunglass case is cheaply made and the inside peelings apart from first time i opened it. The case only opens with excessive force. The sunglasses do look and feel great. The reason for only 2 stars is for the very poor packaging, the cheap broken case, no cleaning wipe. Makes me question the authenticity of the new sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: housemusic

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with scratches and a bit dirty, but still happy.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are a bit dirty fresh out of the box, they appear to be used. It's because of the packaging, I ordered the black frame/grey gradient style. They're very masculine, I was afraid they'd be feminine. The lenses are dark almost black like I was hoping. I'm very happy, I would leave 5 stars but they arrived with minor scratches and dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: Better Than My Last Pair of Prada
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these shades. They look great on and are well made.Exactly as pictured. Giving 4 stars because they are very tight when opening up the sides from the closed position.
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: I love lightweight glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love lightweight glasses. These are great. I just wish the lenses were a little darker. Also, the first pair I received, developed a "film" on the outer lens, and kept spreading. I tried to clean them multiple times with no victory. But as always, Amazon returns came through with GREAT customer service, received my replacement pair in 2 days, and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my hubby years ago at a sunglass store but it got stolen. Finally found it on here for a cheaper price. Quality of sunglass is great and fit is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: camz

customer_reviews.title: 100% Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality glasses. I saw these at Nordstrom for $149 and I was about to buy them but decided to check Amazon first and I’m so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Zinda

customer_reviews.title: Great looking glasses
customer_reviews.text: Loved the packaging, arrived quickly. The fit is awesome and they look expensive and classy. They were a gift and the recipient loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Empress

customer_reviews.title: To receive what I paid for. Nothing more nothing less
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this sunglasses and I was excited to open it . But when I opened it I was shocked. I only received the case and a cleaning cloth. No sunglasses.. I have been a prime member for a long time and this is the first. I don't know if it was an honest mistake but I don't think so. Sounds like a scam..
customer_reviews.author: juvy ancheta

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and affordable
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a pair of these that he had lost they are by far his favorite sunglasses so glad to have found these for such a steal
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm curious because It looked good and as it expected, but After the 3rd wear the middle part started to rub off. Not worth $70+.
customer_reviews.author: shino

customer_reviews.title: misaligned
customer_reviews.text: I really love Carrera sunglasses has a nice sporty look to them. Only issue with the ones I purchased was misaligned.
customer_reviews.author: Strini M.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses, but after the first wear the "leather" bridge strap peeled leaving a grayish material that flaked. Disappointing. Quick shipping and easy return though.
customer_reviews.author: E. Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my trip to Jamaica. After reading previous comments, had low expectations. Nonetheless, felt good with the quality and style of them
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great looking frames
customer_reviews.text: Great looking frames, good tint, but not ground breaking, they fit really tight, too tight, worst part the little leather piece split in half after very minimal use, would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Famous Cal of Memphis Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Certainly not what I expected when it comes about a Carrera Sunglasses, Frame was flawed and lack of simmetry when put on a table, my eyes hurted pretty much after wearing them for 30 mins or so. After several orders through Amazon is the very first time this happens to me. Im totally dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Raul

customer_reviews.title: Dislike the quality. Love the style.
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the quality. Love the style. I bought this exact pair of sunglasses about 2 years ago and they worked out marvelously. I’ve had these less than 2 weeks, worn only 3 times and the sunglasses are peeling and looking worn out. I alway place them back in case with care.
customer_reviews.author: DEJ

customer_reviews.title: Great looking glasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking glasses. Bought as a gift for my husband. He loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Nallely Campuzano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, they arrived in perfect condition and look great. I loved them
customer_reviews.author: fabianrz7

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are very stylish and comfortable. I've only had them for a few days, but have already gotten a number of compliments on them. I ordered them from Eyeglasses123, and would highly recommend them; I have no concerns about the authenticity of the pair I received. These seem very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: King Peeny

customer_reviews.title: Material falling off.
customer_reviews.text: It came with the material in the center peeling off. Not sure what that material was but all of it flaked right of with just a touch. I love the style and the brand. This is my 3rd pair from this brand but very sad to see how this came appart. Tried to pull it all off to see if I should still keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Nice shades!!
customer_reviews.text: I would put 5 but the grip is not the best, slips easily from your nouse. Other than that these shades looks great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: They look great, quality seems fine but after a few months the got a lil loose
customer_reviews.author: BILLY U.

customer_reviews.title: It’s really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This item fits perfectly. I use my glasses on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Wesly Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Authenticity in question....
customer_reviews.text: Like many others say I am starting to question the authenticity of this product. I will keep them coz I'm too far away to return but I am not pleased. As far as the actual,product goes...they're very stylish and I've gotten quite a few compliments on the day that I wore them, but they're a bit heavier than I'm used to and the sit a bit low on your nose. These were bought for a friend who also has an amazon account and he says that this was the final straw for him as far as ordering brand name products from Amazon is concerned. NOT IMPRESSED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Afira Approoo

customer_reviews.title: Carrera is the best one!
customer_reviews.text: In the past, I had only one favorite glasses brand- Ray-Ban but for now, I love Carrera too.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the all black pair of shades for a father's day gift and recieved the incorrect pair which cost less then the pair I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Whitnee

customer_reviews.title: They were worth the money if you like sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: My Husband loves them. Fit his face perfectly and came with all the bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Lost mine in the ocean. Bought them at Nordstrom last time for twice the price. Best deal ever, they seem legit and even come with a one year warranty!
customer_reviews.author: alex ivaschenko

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses look good, but small strip of leather between frames comes off easily. Looks like a scab afterwards

customer_reviews.title: Great color combo
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these. He absolutely loves the color combination
customer_reviews.author: Shen

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: If anyone is giving these a bad review they don
customer_reviews.text: If anyone is giving these a bad review they don;t deserve to wear Carreras... This is my 4th or 5th pair of Carreras since about 2010 and the are simply great. I get lots of compliments and the black looks really dressy.

customer_reviews.title: Best glasses ever
customer_reviews.text: Normally I never find any problems with my purchase on Amazon but now I'm speechless. I'm in love😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable pair
customer_reviews.text: These are real nice ive tried on some other carreras and these are by far my favorite affordable pair.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: these sunglasses do not have blue lenses are gray, because I wanted to buy them blue...

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, perfect fit, light weight, trendy, straight fyr!! Highly recommended.. get a pair!

customer_reviews.title: Leather piece peeling
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas. Within 3 months the little leather piece above where the glasses sit on your nose is peeling off and the glasses look horrible with that.

customer_reviews.title: Carreras Rock!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of sunglasses!!! They are actually the real thing!!! Great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These shades are really nice. Look and feel great on. Highly recommend. Shipped quick! Ordered Friday morning and received them Sunday morning.

customer_reviews.title: The design is nice but bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Made in china, the leather strap with the carrera logo fell off and you have to tighten the screws often. The design is nice but bad quality.

customer_reviews.title: Decent

customer_reviews.title: I dig em.
customer_reviews.text: These are super dope. Came with a soft a d hard case and some stickers. I dig them.

customer_reviews.title: I got these for my boyfriend for his birthday and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend for his birthday and he loves them.

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a rockstar
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these glasses. Get compliments on them every time I wear them.

customer_reviews.title: They are nice shades.
customer_reviews.text: They are nice shades ... They're just a bit too big for my head and would fall off of I leaned over too far. If you have a larger face/head ... They would be great.

customer_reviews.title: Nice style
customer_reviews.text: I like the style, but I didn't like the light weight of the frames.

customer_reviews.title: Ended up returning these because I didn’t like the fit
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning these because I didn’t like the fit, but quality was great, they came quickly, and the return was easy.

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious feeling.
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. They feel very luxurious on your face.

customer_reviews.title: very nice sun glasses

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I really liked them they look good and look pretty authentic to
customer_reviews.text: I really liked them they look good and look pretty authentic to ..i almost didnt buy cuss i would read all the bad reviews about them but im glad i did buy them couldnt be happier .i recommend them

customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I get so many compliments on these and they fit great. I've had them now for almost a year and the quality is solid.

customer_reviews.text: They seem to be used, there was dirt and sweat marks there was also some scratches and there made in China!!, the box was all scratched and there was finger prints all over, for such a high end product I would expect a little more, like a cleaning rag, even the $5 sun glasses come with one!!!! product_meta.title: Carrera CA33/S Pilot Sunglasses
product_meta.description: The history of the Carrera brand begins in 1956, in the field of sports glasses, ski goggles, and helmets. It's the story of passion, innovation and success. Being a leader means being ahead of your time. This is the attitude that Carrera has always possessed. In order to guarantee and constantly improve their quality, Carrera products are developed in collaboration with world-class athletes. Thanks to Carrera's passion for design and technological research, their products are continuously ranked among the best in the eyewear industry. Their fresh designs have been worn by Alicia Keys, Lady GaGa, and other trendsetters.
